name: One Bit Paint
description:
PAINT FOR GAMEBOY IS FINALLY HERE!

I wanted to create something cool for the GameBoy and the Game Boy Competition 2021, so why not create an application that lets you draw on a GameBoy screen?

This project is Open Source and I would be more than happy to see people collaborating. Here's the source code: https://github.com/pedroafabri/one-bit-paint
